content.text: Good, good. I'm retired and enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That's nice. I'm a technician and enjoy watching WWE wrestling. I'm really excited for the Royal Rumble on Sunday!
I've heard of that, but I don't know much about it.
It's a wrestling match where 30 wrestlers enter and the last man standing wins. It's a lot of fun.
That sounds interesting. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch WWE, play video games, and go hiking.
I like to watch tennis and golf on TV. I also have two pitt bulls.
I've never been to a renaissance fair. I've heard they're a lot of fun.
They are! I've been to a few and they're always a good time.
I've been bankrupt and back. It was a tough experience, but I'm glad I made it through.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm glad you're doing better now.
Thanks. I'm doing much better now
